name: beta-kubernetes
preInstallNotes:
Kubernetes on DC/OS is currently in Beta and should not be used in production.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 6 CPU | 5654 MB MEM | 615 MB Disk

Please visit our quickstart repository (https://github.com/mesosphere/dcos-kubernetes-quickstart) for example deployments.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Kubernetes is being installed!

	Documentation: https://github.com/mesosphere/dcos-kubernetes-quickstart
	Issues: https://jira.mesosphere.com
